Class GroceryItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • GroceryItem

  • public class GroceryItem
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a grocery item that can be purchased while shopping. Each grocery item has a name and price, and may be taxed. The class also allows for checking if two grocery items are equal.
    Author:
    Richard Wen, Elise Merritt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GroceryItem(java.lang.String name, double price, boolean taxable)
      Creates a new grocery item given the name, price and taxable status of the item.

    • Method Summary

      Checks if a given grocery item is equal to another grocery item.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the grocery item.
      double getPrice()
      Retrieves the price of this item.
      boolean isTaxable()
      Retrieves the taxable status of this item.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Creates a string representation of this grocery item for easy display.

        getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GroceryItem

        public GroceryItem(java.lang.String name,
                   double price,
                   boolean taxable)
        Creates a new grocery item given the name, price and taxable status of the item.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new Grocery Item
        price - the price of the new Grocery Item
        taxable - true if the new Grocery Item is taxable, false otherwise

    • Method Detail

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Checks if a given grocery item is equal to another grocery item. Two grocery items are considered equal if they are both grocery items and have the same name, price, and taxable status.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to be checked against this Grocery Item for equality
        Returns:
        true if this Grocery Item and the given object are equal, false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Creates a string representation of this grocery item for easy display.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string showing the name, price, and taxable status of grocery item

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Retrieves the name of the grocery item.
        Returns:
        name of the grocery item

      • getPrice

        public double getPrice()
        Retrieves the price of this item.
        Returns:
        price of the grocery item

      • isTaxable

        public boolean isTaxable()
        Retrieves the taxable status of this item.
        Returns:
        true if the grocery item is taxable, false otherwise
